description: The deposited structure of PDB entry 1l7c coloured by B-factor values. The macromolecules are shown in backbone representation. The thickness reflects the B-factor values (thin = low, thick = high). The colour varies from blue to red corresponding to a B-factor range of 0 to 100 square angstroms.
